# Operations Sparring

![License](https://img.shields.io/badge/license-MIT-blue.svg)
![Version](https://img.shields.io/badge/version-1.0.0-green.svg)

**A specialized AI Sparring Partner for Operations professionals.**

---

## â“ Why This Plugin is Different

Most AI plugins are just **Toolboxes** - they give you a hammer and saw but don't tell you how to build a house.

**Operations Sparring** is a **Thinking Partner**. It combines:
1.  **Expert Agents**: A "Sparring Mentor" who knows the best frameworks (e.g., First Principles, Jobs-to-be-Done, RICE).
2.  **Proactive Challenge**: It doesn't just answer; it asks "Is this the right problem?" and "Have you considered X?"
3.  **Deep Skills**: A library of 13 professional skills (not just distinct scripts, but integrated workflows).

It doesn't just execute commands; it **elevates your thinking**.

---

## ðŸš€ Installation

### Option 1: Marketplace (Recommended)
If you have configured the Conversational Sparring marketplace:
```bash
/plugin install operations-sparring@conversational-sparring-marketplace
```

### Option 2: Direct Install
1.  Download this folder.
2.  Run in Claude Code:
    ```bash
    /plugin install ./
    ```

---

## ðŸ§  What's Included

### 1. The Sparring Partner (Agent)
Your dedicated AI co-pilot. Trigger it by asking:
> "Spar with me on [topic]..."
> "Challenge my assumptions about..."
> "Help me plan a [project]..."

### 2. Professional Skills (13)
This plugin includes a curated suite of skills:

| Skill | Description |
| :--- | :--- |
| `revenue-analytics` | Professional workflow for revenue analytics |
| `confluence-expert` | Professional workflow for confluence expert |
| `pdf` | Professional workflow for pdf |
| `jira-expert` | Professional workflow for jira expert |
| `scrum-master` | Professional workflow for scrum master |
| `quality-manager-qms-iso13485` | Professional workflow for quality manager qms iso13485 |
| `compliance-analyst` | Professional workflow for compliance analyst |
| `crm-hygiene` | Professional workflow for crm hygiene |
| `pptx` | Professional workflow for pptx |
| `process-automation` | Professional workflow for process automation |
| `project-management` | Professional workflow for project management |
| `docx` | Professional workflow for docx |
| `senior-pm` | Professional workflow for senior pm |
